description: A dashboard that monitors Syncthing. The dashboards were generated using syncthing-mixin. https://github.com/adinhodovic/syncthing-mixin. Open issues and create feature requests in the repository.

panels.description: The total number of folders being synchronized by Syncthing.
panels.title: Folders

panels.description: The total number of devices connected to Syncthing.
panels.title: Devices

panels.description: The rate of events occurring in Syncthing, measured in events per second.
panels.title: Events

panels.description: The rate of filesystem operations performed by Syncthing, measured in operations per second.
panels.title: Filesystem Operations

panels.description: The distribution of events in Syncthing, categorized by event type over the last hour.
panels.title: Events by Type [1h]

panels.description: The total number of bytes in each folder being synchronized by Syncthing.
panels.title: Folder Total Bytes

panels.description: The total number of directories in each folder being synchronized by Syncthing.
panels.title: Folder Total Directories

panels.description: The total number of files in each folder being synchronized by Syncthing.
panels.title: Folder Total Files

panels.description: The total number of deleted items in each folder being synchronized by Syncthing.
panels.title: Folder Total Deleted Items

panels.description: The rate of created events in Syncthing, categorized by event type and measured in events per second.
panels.title: Events Created Rate

panels.description: The rate of delivered events in Syncthing, categorized by event type and measured in events per second.
panels.title: Events Delivered Rate

panels.description: The rate of Dropped events in Syncthing, categorized by event type and measured in events per second.
panels.title: Events Dropped Rate

panels.description: The current state of each folder being synchronized by Syncthing, categorized by state type.
panels.title: Folder State

panels.description: The number of bytes needed to be synchronized in each folder by Syncthing, categorized by folder.

targets.expr:
sum(
  syncthing_model_folder_summary{
    cluster="$cluster",
job=~"$job"
,
folder=~"$folder"
,
    scope="need",
    type="bytes"
  }
) by (folder)

panels.title: Needed Bytes by Folder

panels.description: The total number of bytes in each folder being synchronized by Syncthing, categorized by folder.

targets.expr:
sum(
  syncthing_model_folder_summary{
    cluster="$cluster",
job=~"$job"
,
folder=~"$folder"
,
    scope="global",
    type="bytes"
  }
) by (folder)

panels.title: Total Bytes by Folder

panels.description: The total number of directories in each folder being synchronized by Syncthing, categorized by folder.

targets.expr:
sum(
  syncthing_model_folder_summary{
    cluster="$cluster",
job=~"$job"
,
folder=~"$folder"
,
    scope="global",
    type="directories"
  }
) by (folder)

panels.title: Total Directories by Folder

panels.description: The total number of files in each folder being synchronized by Syncthing, categorized by folder.

targets.expr:
sum(
  syncthing_model_folder_summary{
    cluster="$cluster",
job=~"$job"
,
folder=~"$folder"
,
    scope="global",
    type="files"
  }
) by (folder)

panels.title: Total Files by Folder

panels.description: The total number of deleted items in each folder being synchronized by Syncthing, categorized by folder.

targets.expr:
sum(
  syncthing_model_folder_summary{
    cluster="$cluster",
job=~"$job"
,
folder=~"$folder"
,
    scope="global",
    type="deleted"
  }
) by (folder)

panels.title: Total Deleted Items by Folder

panels.description: The rate of pull operations for each folder, measured in pulls per second.
panels.title: Folder Pulls Rate

panels.description: The rate of scan operations for each folder, measured in scans per second.
panels.title: Folder Scans Rate

panels.description: The rate of bytes hashed during scans by Syncthing, measured in bytes per second.
panels.title: Scanner Hashed Bytes Rate

panels.description: The rate of items scanned by Syncthing, measured in items per second.
panels.title: Scanner Scanned Items Rate

panels.description: The rate of filesystem operations performed by Syncthing, categorized by operation type and root directory, measured in operations per second.
panels.title: Filesystem Operations Rate

panels.description: The rate of bytes processed during filesystem operations by Syncthing, categorized by operation type and root directory, measured in bytes per second.
panels.title: Filesystem Operations Bytes Rate

panels.description: The rate of time spent on filesystem operations by Syncthing, categorized by operation type and root directory, measured in seconds per second.
panels.title: Filesystem Operations Seconds Rate

panels.description: The rate of bytes sent over the network by Syncthing, measured in bytes per second.
panels.title: Network Sent Bytes Rate

panels.description: The rate of messages sent over the network by Syncthing, measured in messages per second.
panels.title: Network Sent Messages Rate

panels.description: The rate of bytes received over the network by Syncthing, measured in bytes per second.
panels.title: Network Received Bytes Rate

panels.description: The rate of messages received over the network by Syncthing, measured in messages per second.
panels.title: Network Received Messages Rate

title: Syncthing / Overview
